metadata.title: FTL: MULTIVERSE - FORGOTTEN RACES ADDON
metadata.author: Gabriel Cooper And HereticChurch
metadata.description:
PATCH AFTER MULTIVERSE, REQUIRES FUSION 0.1.0+ AND THE RENEGADE COLLECTION, PATCH BOTH OF THOSE BEFORE FR
This mod brings back the in-canon extinct subclass of the Ancients/Obelisks called the "Commonwealth". It adds content for the now almost extinct salt people race and a new cruiser line for the Osmians, as well as a brand new sector with unique music and a few unlocks beacons all throughout the game.
Forgotten Races also adds 146 new ships, 141 weapons and drones not counting artilleries (mostly exclusive to said ships), 54 new crews that can be found on the new ships, a revived questline with dozens of unlocks that wasn't implemented to multiverse years ago and 2 new renegade bosses, both with exclusive weapons. Those ships all have some kinda gimmick, not all of them have a very complicated one however.
(Huge thanks to Cyrus, Altzeus, DemonFusion, Alder, Kix, Pepson, Chrono, Arc, Lizzard and Julk who helped this mod a lot over the course of its development; this little addon wouldn't be nowhere near what it is now without their help)
Proofreading and rewrites by : Alder
Some combat icons made by: Alder

Metal Lanius's miniship sprites made by : Kix
Obelisk flagship's artillery sprites made by : Kix
CEL Ion sprite made by : Kix
Sprites for the rues and Federation artilleries made by : Kix
Help with the new salt cruiser sprite by: AgentTHeKatie
Tully dialog rewrites by : slow
Golden Flak sprite made by : MISTER D, CERTIFIED MISTER
Tartarus's music (both explore and battle) as well as G's theme and the commonwealth sector music was made by: Altzeus
All 3 of the Exterminator's boss tracks were made by: Lizzard
Watcher's cruiser and enemy hull made by: woona
Salt Weapons and zulu's pike Sprites by: Alder
Spherax Eye Code by: Pepson
Grammar help by: kāne and Nissa
artillery surges code made by: Chrono Vortex
sammy sprites made by:܇Moreorlesser

appending codding help by :܇Blizz/mr_easy_money
Achievement icons for the Operator, flagships (including the RUES flagship), Snowman, Osmian, salt battleship and metal pyramid ships made by: AgentTHeKatie
Works with Multiverse 5.4.X
